## Exercise 1 page 88
1.  Four people are to be arranged in a row to have their picture taken.      In how many ways can this be done?

## Solution 
Four can be arrange of the folowing order

$P(n,n) = \frac {n!}{(n- k)!}$
$P(4,4) = \frac {4!}{4-4}!$
$P(4,4) = \frac {4*3*2*1}{0}!$
$P(4,4) = 24$

There are 24 ways to arange 4 people.
